long_description: The collapsible Sea to Summit X-Shot glass is perfect for an early morning shot of espresso or measuring out liquids when cooking up a gourmet camp meal. Flexible food-grade silicone walls collapse, slimming the shot glass down to a slender 0.5 in. thick and minimizing the space it takes up in a pack. Flexible walls let you accurately pour liquid from the glass into another container. Features English and metric gradations; holds 2.5 fl. oz. (75ml). Walls and base withstand temperatures up to 300degF. Sea to Summit X-Shot glass is dishwasher safe.
short_description: The collapsible Sea to Summit X-Shot glass is perfect for an early morning shot of espresso or measuring out liquids when cooking up a gourmet camp meal.
